footer.credit: Personal project, not for commercial use.

features.recordDesc: From an aerial view, presenting a unique perspective and dynamic visuals, making every moment of life more vivid and unforgettable.
features.agricultureDesc: Drones in modern agriculture perform precise fertilization and spraying, greatly improving agricultural productivity.
features.rescueDesc: In complex mountain environments, drones can quickly locate trapped individuals and help rescue teams devise optimal rescue routes.
features.appDesc: With our drone APP, you can operate the drone through smart devices at any time.
features.patrolSystemDesc: With the latest automatic detection patrol system, drones can autonomously conduct wide-area monitoring, providing round-the-clock security, and keeping you informed of the situation.
features.transportNetworkDesc: In the future, we aim to develop a manned mobile transport network, allowing you to quickly traverse the city with drones for a more convenient travel experience.

productDetailPage.regulations: －Civil Aviation Law Remote Control Drone Regulations－
productDetailPage.regulation1: 1. Remote control drones with a maximum takeoff weight of 250 grams or more must be registered.
productDetailPage.regulation2: 2. Before operating a remote control drone, check the activity area and comply with operational regulations.
productDetailPage.regulation3: 3. For information on related activity areas and operational regulations, please refer to the Civil Aviation Authority's website and remote control drone resource app.
